name: BowlShip
description: This hilarious top down space shooter free for all has you laughing as you annihilate your friends! Using Xbox 360/Xbox One controllers in 16:9 resolution, you can play with up to 8 friends on one computer! Even if you don't have that many controllers, don't worry, there's an option to allow two players per controller! The action begins as soon as you select a character, so cause mayhem even in the menus! With 8 ships, 4 game modes, and 5 stages to choose from, the action never gets old! So whether you're shooting it out on the credits screen or flying infinitely fast through portals, have fun in this piece of BowlShip!
